group_1.textRight: So, this story... It's an original concept@by the idiota before me, correct?

group_1.textLeft: Hee hee...yeah. It's my latest work!
I heard all the rumors about a Death Santa.
And I thought, [chara:101201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101201:cheek_0][chara:101201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101201:lipSynch_1]"This is gonna be the next@Phantom Thief Magical Kirin!"
Then the ideas just kept popping up inside@me, so I drew them out.

group_1.textRight: Though your art is a little more palatable@to look at than your old work.

group_1.textLeft: Er...
[chara:101201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Th-thank you!

group_1.textRight: It sounds too similar to that character in@the story from Magical Kirin.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!
Wait...that book I lent you.
The most recent volume of "Phantom Thief@Magical Kirin"...
You paid that much attention to it when you@read it?!
That's my Alina!
When I lent it to you...
Honestly, I wasn't sure whether you'd even@bother reading it.
But now I see you're as much of a@Kirinite as I am! Maybe more!
And now I'm thinking up a plot for the next@chapter in our Maiden of Mortality's story!
Yes... Why does she go about bringing@good luck to people around town?
I want to shed light on her motivations!
Alina, if you're free...
I'd love it if you could think about@Christmas Death Caribou's motives with me!
What drives her?

group_1.textRight: (Well, her real goal is to power the Uwasa@that she's fused with.)
(Though thus far there has not been a single@success in that regard...)
(Ugh, remembering that fact has ruined my@umore quite a bit...)

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]?!
My strawberry milk?! But...but why?!
Alina! I can't believe you!
